discussione.titolo: Goal: cleaning 300000kmÂ² of water. Where do we start?
discussione.descrizione: We need to select 10 sea areas to clean. Any suggestion? Consider they must be near to our support bases which are located in: Taranto (Itay), Cape Town (South Africa) and Hong Kong (China).
